title: Backend Engineer Interview Guide
description: Prepare for APIs, databases, and distributed systems interviews.

content.text: Backend interviews focus on server-side programming, database design, API architecture, and distributed systems. You'll face coding challenges, system design questions, and deep dives into scalability.

**What interviewers assess:**

- Server-side programming proficiency
- Database design and optimization
- API design principles
- Distributed systems concepts
- Performance and scalability thinking

**Typical backend interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Technical phone screen** (45-60 min) - Coding problem
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (4-5 hours):
   - Coding rounds (algorithms, data structures)
   - System design round
   - API/database design round
   - Behavioral round
In system design, always discuss trade-offs. There's no perfect solutionâ€”show you understand the implications of your choices.
